title: Fragment, 1902-1-547, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming pile (velvet); them embossed (stamped).
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
description: Vertical stripes of fleur-de lys shapes and circles in red velvet. The marks where galloon or trim had been sewn to the piece can be seen.
